articles.description: Tickets are open for destinations including London, the US, Hong Kong and Singapore.
articles.content:
Aussie travellers could be back in the skies and heading overseas in just six months after Qantas reopened bookings for its international network.
Tickets from July 2021 are now on sale to destinati… [+3242 chars]
